machine_end_gcode.2026-02-25:
G91 ;Relative positioning
G1 E-1 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 Z1 E-1 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 Z2 ;Raise Z
G90 ;Absolute positioning
G12 ;clean nozzle
G1 X5 Y319 ;Return to Start Point
M106 S0 ;Switch off part cooling fan
M104 S0 ;turn off temperature
M140 S0 ;turn off Heated Bed
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
M81 ;turn-off power

machine_start_gcode.2026-02-25:
G1 Z2 ;Raise Z
G28 X Y ;Home XY
T1 ;switch to right extruder
G1 X5 Y319 F4000 ;Move to Start Position
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 E20 F60 ;extrude
M400 ;Wait move
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 E-2 F2700 ;Retract
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X150 F5000 ;Clean Nozzle
G1 X5 ;Clean Nozzle
G1 X220 ;Repeat
G1 X5 ;Back to start posotion
T0 ;switch to left extruder
G1 X5 Y319 F4000 ;Move to Start Position
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 E20 F60 ;extrude
M400 ;Wait move
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G4 S15 ;Wait 15s
G1 E-2 F2700; Retract
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X150 F5000 ;Clean Nozzle
G1 X5 ;Clean nozzle
G1 X220 ;Repeat
G1 X5 ;Back to start position
G28 Z ;home Z
G29 ;Measure the bed
M500 ;Store parameters
G1 X0 Y300 F4000 ;Move to corner
